text: Maureen Stolt (born March 3, 1979) is an American curler from Plymouth, Minnesota. Stolt competes with her husband Peter Stolt in mixed doubles competition. Together they have won the United States Mixed Doubles Curling Championship once, in 2013, and finished in second place three times. Their national championship in 2013 earned them the right to represent the US at the 2013 World Mixed Doubles Curling Championship, where they finished in fourth place in the Yellow Pool. ==References== == External links == * Category:1979 births Category:Living people Category:American female curlers Category:Curlers from Saskatchewan Category:People from Plymouth, Minnesota Category:Sportspeople from Saskatoon Category:Canadian women curlers Category:Canadian emigrants to the United States
title: Maureen Stolt
